mapper.select: select t.prj_item_id as prjItemId,prj_item_name as prjItemName,prj_item_num as prjItemNum,prj_item_type as prjItemType, prj_name as prjName,company_name as companyName,person_in_charge as personInCharge from tx_pro_contract_rel p left join tx_project_item t on p.prj_item_id = t.prj_item_id left join tx_company_info c on t.belong_company = c.company_Id where contract_id = #{contractId} order by t.create_time desc
mapper.delete: delete from tx_pro_contract_rel where contract_Id = #{contractId} and prj_item_id = #{prjItemId}
